title: Bug 18934: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
description: When using the ImageAnalyzer example, scrollbars are enabled and can be moved, but they do not have any effect. This can be misleading when opening a small image such as an icon, as the scrollbars do not actually do anything.
OB: Scrollbars are enabled in the ImageAnalyzer example, but they do not have any effect when moved.
EB: Scrollbars in the ImageAnalyzer example should be disabled to prevent confusion and provide a more accurate representation of the image size.
SR:
1. Build F2 (20020602)
2. Open the ImageAnalyzer example.
3. Notice that the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved.
4. Open a small image, such as an icon.
5. Observe that the scrollbars do not have any effect when moved.
